description.zh-cn: 台湾当代乡土文学作家，创作文类以小说为主，旁及散文、诗、儿童文学、戏剧等，其作品曾被翻译为多种语言。普遍被公认为台湾当代重要的乡土小说家。
description.en: A Taiwanese contemporary vernacular literature writer, mainly known for his novels, but also works in essays, poetry, children's literature, and drama. His works have been translated into multiple languages. He is widely regarded as an important contemporary novelist in Taiwan.

description.zh-cn: 台湾宜兰县下的一个镇，为作家黄春明的出生地。
description.en: A township in Yilan County, Taiwan, the birthplace of writer Huang Chun-ming.

description.zh-cn: 黄春明的妻子，曾是中国广播公司的同事。
description.en: Wife of Huang Chun-ming, formerly his colleague at the Broadcasting Corporation of China.

description.zh-cn: 黄春明的长子。
description.en: The eldest son of Huang Chun-ming.

description.zh-cn: 黄春明的次子，亦是一名作家。
description.en: The second son of Huang Chun-ming, who was also a writer.

description.zh-cn: 位于台湾屏东县的大学，黄春明于1958年于此毕业。
description.en: A university located in Pingtung County, Taiwan, from which Huang Chun-ming graduated in 1958.

description.zh-cn: 黄春明中学时期的国文老师，是其文学启蒙导师，后被国民党政府指控为赤色分子并遭枪毙。
description.en: Huang Chun-ming's Chinese language teacher in middle school and his literary mentor. She was later accused by the Kuomintang government of being a communist and was executed by firing squad.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国的创始政党之一。其迁台后的政府曾指控王贤春为赤色分子并将其处决。
description.en: One of the founding political parties of the Republic of China. Its government, after relocating to Taiwan, accused Wang Xianchun of being a communist and executed her.

description.zh-cn: 台湾作家，曾任《联合报》副刊主编，在黄春明创作生涯早期大力提携他。
description.en: A Taiwanese writer who served as the editor of the literary supplement of the United Daily News. She greatly supported Huang Chun-ming in the early stages of his writing career.

description.zh-cn: 一份台湾文学刊物，黄春明于1966年加入。
description.en: A Taiwanese literary journal that Huang Chun-ming joined in 1966.

description.zh-cn: 台湾电影导演，台湾电影新浪潮的代表人物之一。曾导演改编自黄春明小说的电影《儿子的大玩偶》。
description.en: A Taiwanese film director and a leading figure of the Taiwan New Wave cinema. He directed the film "The Sandwich Man," adapted from Huang Chun-ming's novel.

description.zh-cn: 台湾电影编剧、导演。曾将黄春明的多部小说改编为电影剧本。
description.en: A Taiwanese screenwriter and director. He adapted several of Huang Chun-ming's novels into screenplays.

description.zh-cn: 台湾电影导演，曾导演改编自黄春明小说《小琪的那顶帽子》的电影片段。
description.en: A Taiwanese film director who directed the film segment adapted from Huang Chun-ming's short story "Vicki's Hat".

description.zh-cn: 台湾电影导演，曾导演改编自黄春明小说《苹果的滋味》的电影片段。
description.en: A Taiwanese film director who directed the film segment adapted from Huang Chun-ming's short story "The Taste of Apples".

description.zh-cn: 台湾电影导演，曾导演改编自黄春明同名小说的电影《看海的日子》。
description.en: A Taiwanese film director who directed the film "A Flower in the Raining Night," adapted from Huang Chun-ming's novel of the same name.

description.zh-cn: 台湾电影导演，曾导演改编自黄春明小说的电影《两个油漆匠》。
description.en: A Taiwanese film director who directed the film "The Two Painters," adapted from Huang Chun-ming's novel.

description.zh-cn: 1980年代台湾兴起的电影运动，多部改编自黄春明小说的电影是此运动的重要作品。
description.en: A film movement that emerged in Taiwan in the 1980s. Several films adapted from Huang Chun-ming's novels are considered key works of this movement.

description.zh-cn: 由黄春明于1993年在其家乡宜兰创立的工作室，旨在抢救本土文化。
description.en: A studio founded by Huang Chun-ming in his hometown of Yilan in 1993, aimed at preserving local culture.

description.zh-cn: 位于台湾台北市的艺术大学，黄春明自1993年起在此担任兼任教师。
description.en: An arts university located in Taipei, Taiwan, where Huang Chun-ming has been an adjunct instructor since 1993.

description.zh-cn: 位于台湾宜兰县的大学，黄春明曾在此担任兼任教授，并获颁荣誉文学博士学位。
description.en: A university in Yilan County, Taiwan, where Huang Chun-ming served as an adjunct professor and was awarded an honorary doctorate in literature.

description.zh-cn: 位于台湾台北市的综合性研究型大学，于2022年授予黄春明名誉博士学位。
description.en: A comprehensive research university in Taipei, Taiwan, which awarded Huang Chun-ming an honorary doctorate in 2022.

description.zh-cn: 国立成功大学台湾文学系副教授。2011年在一场演讲中与黄春明发生激烈言语冲突，并对其提起公然侮辱诉讼。
description.en: An associate professor in the Department of Taiwanese Literature at National Cheng Kung University. In 2011, he had a heated verbal conflict with Huang Chun-ming during a lecture and subsequently filed a lawsuit against him for public insult.

description.zh-cn: 位于台湾台南市的综合性研究型大学，蒋为文在此任教。
description.en: A comprehensive research university in Tainan, Taiwan, where Chiang Wei-wen teaches.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国的地方法院之一，负责审理台南市的民刑事等案件。曾一审判决黄春明公然侮辱罪成立。
description.en: One of the district courts in the Republic of China, responsible for hearing civil and criminal cases in Tainan City. It initially found Huang Chun-ming guilty of public insult in the first instance.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国的检察机关，在黄春明与蒋为文的诉讼案中，认为黄的行为属正当防卫而提起上诉。
description.en: A prosecutorial agency of the Republic of China. In the lawsuit between Huang Chun-ming and Chiang Wei-wen, it appealed the verdict, arguing that Huang's actions constituted self-defense.

nodes.id: 台湾高等法院台南分院

zh-cn: 台湾高等法院台南分院

description.zh-cn: 中华民国台湾高等法院的分院，在黄春明与蒋为文的诉讼案中作出二审判决。
description.en: A branch of the Taiwan High Court of the Republic of China, which delivered the second-instance judgment in the lawsuit between Huang Chun-ming and Chiang Wei-wen.

description.zh-cn: 连接台湾台北至宜兰的高速公路，其兴建曾遭到黄春明基于环保立场的反对。
description.en: An expressway connecting Taipei and Yilan in Taiwan. Its construction was opposed by Huang Chun-ming on environmental grounds.

description.zh-cn: 计划连接台湾苏澳至花莲的高速公路，其兴建曾遭到黄春明基于环保立场的反对。
description.en: A planned expressway to connect Su'ao and Hualien in Taiwan. Its construction was opposed by Huang Chun-ming on environmental grounds.

description.zh-cn: 位于蔣渭水高速公路的一座长隧道。黄春明曾因反对北宜高而誓言永不通过此隧道。
description.en: A long tunnel on the Chiang Wei-shui Memorial Freeway. Huang Chun-ming once vowed never to pass through it in opposition to the freeway's construction.

description.zh-cn: 王贤春是黄春明中学时期的启蒙老师，她鼓励黄春明创作，并向他推荐文学作品，对他日后的文学道路产生了深远影响。
description.en: Wang Xianchun was Huang Chun-ming's mentor in middle school. She encouraged his writing, recommended literary works to him, and had a profound influence on his future literary path.

description.zh-cn: 黄春明的启蒙老师王贤春被中国国民党指控为赤色分子，遭到拘捕并被枪毙。
description.en: Huang Chun-ming's mentor, Wang Xianchun, was accused by the Kuomintang of being a communist, arrested, and executed by firing squad.

description.zh-cn: 1962年，时任《联合报》副刊主编的林海音在刊物上发表黄春明的小说，并大力提携他，帮助他进入文坛。
description.en: In 1962, Lin Haiyin, then editor of the literary supplement of the United Daily News, published Huang Chun-ming's novels and strongly promoted him, helping him enter the literary scene.

description.zh-cn: 黄春明的多部小说在1980年代被改编成电影，这些作品成为台湾电影新浪潮时期的重要代表作，推动了该运动的发展。
description.en: Several of Huang Chun-ming's novels were adapted into films in the 1980s. These works became important representatives of the New Taiwanese Cinema movement, promoting its development.

description.zh-cn: 吴念真将黄春明的小说《儿子的大玩偶》、《小琪的那顶帽子》、《苹果的滋味》及《两个油漆匠》改编为电影剧本。
description.en: Wu Nien-jen adapted Huang Chun-ming's novels "The Sandwich Man," "Vicki's Hat," "The Taste of Apples," and "The Two Painters" into screenplays.

description.zh-cn: 侯孝贤于1983年导演了由黄春明小说改编的电影《儿子的大玩偶》中的同名首段。
description.en: In 1983, Hou Hsiao-hsien directed the first segment of the film "The Sandwich Man," which was adapted from Huang Chun-ming's novel of the same name.

description.zh-cn: 曾壮祥于1983年导演了改编自黄春明小说《小琪的那顶帽子》的电影片段。
description.en: In 1983, Tseng Chuang-hsiang directed a film segment adapted from Huang Chun-ming's short story "Vicki's Hat".

description.zh-cn: 万仁于1983年导演了改编自黄春明小说《苹果的滋味》的电影片段。
description.en: In 1983, Wan Jen directed a film segment adapted from Huang Chun-ming's short story "The Taste of Apples".

description.zh-cn: 王童于1983年导演了由黄春明编剧的同名小说改编电影《看海的日子》。
description.en: In 1983, Wang Toon directed the film "A Flower in the Raining Night," which was adapted from Huang Chun-ming's novel of the same name and for which Huang wrote the screenplay.

description.zh-cn: 虞戡平于1984年导演了由黄春明小说改编的电影《两个油漆匠》。
description.en: In 1984, Yu Kan-ping directed the film "The Two Painters," adapted from a novel by Huang Chun-ming.

description.zh-cn: 1993年，为抢救日渐流失的本土文化，黄春明在家乡宜兰创立了吉祥巷工作室。
description.en: In 1993, to preserve the gradually disappearing local culture, Huang Chun-ming founded the Jixiang Lane Studio in his hometown of Yilan.

position.en: Adjunct Art Teacher, Department of Theatre Arts

description.zh-cn: 佛光大学于2008年授予黄春明荣誉文学博士学位。
description.en: Fo Guang University awarded Huang Chun-ming an Honorary Doctorate of Literature in 2008.

description.zh-cn: 国立台湾大学于2022年11月15日授予黄春明名誉博士学位。
description.en: National Taiwan University awarded Huang Chun-ming an Honorary Doctorate on November 15, 2022.

description.zh-cn: 蒋为文在黄春明的演讲会上举牌抗议，指责其不用台湾语文创作，引发黄春明愤怒回应。两人发生激烈言语冲突，后续蒋为文以公然侮辱罪控告黄春明。
description.en: Chiang Wei-wen protested with a sign at Huang Chun-ming's lecture, criticizing him for not writing in Taiwanese languages, which angered Huang. They had a heated verbal conflict, and Chiang later sued Huang for public insult.

position.en: Associate Professor, Department of Taiwanese Literature

description.zh-cn: 就与蒋为文的冲突事件，台南地方法院一审判决黄春明公然侮辱罪成立，罚金一万元，缓刑二年。
description.en: Regarding the conflict with Chiang Wei-wen, the Tainan District Court found Huang Chun-ming guilty of public insult in the first instance, fining him NT$10,000 with a two-year probation.

description.zh-cn: 就黄春明公然侮辱案提起上诉，认为其行为属“正当防卫”，要求改判无罪。
description.en: Appealed the public insult case against Huang Chun-ming, arguing that his actions constituted 'legitimate self-defense' and requested an acquittal.

relationships.source: 台湾高等法院台南分院

description.zh-cn: 二审仍宣判黄春明有罪，但考量其受到挑衅且情节轻微，改判免刑定谳。
description.en: In the second instance, the court upheld the guilty verdict against Huang Chun-ming but, considering he was provoked and the offense was minor, changed the sentence to an exemption from punishment, finalizing the case.

description.zh-cn: 出于环保理念，黄春明曾公开反对兴建北宜高速公路。
description.en: Based on environmental principles, Huang Chun-ming publicly opposed the construction of the Taipei-Yilan Expressway.

description.zh-cn: 出于环保理念，黄春明曾公开反对兴建苏花高速公路。
description.en: Based on environmental principles, Huang Chun-ming publicly opposed the construction of the Su'ao-Hualien Expressway.

description.zh-cn: 为表达对兴建北宜高的环保立场，黄春明曾于2006年公开誓言“一辈子不走雪隧”。
description.en: To express his environmental stance against the construction of the Taipei-Yilan Expressway, Huang Chun-ming publicly vowed in 2006, "I will never take the Hsuehshan Tunnel in my life."
